item.title: Mod crown in yell help
item.dc:creator: @drew56133 drew56133
item.description:
@drew56133 wrote:

[quote=“killerjens9, post:3, topic:472942”]try this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.playerRights >= 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("[Owner] " <img=2> "+ c.playerName + ": @dre@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } } }[/quote] <img=2> doesn’t work already tried.

Read full topic

try this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.playerRights >= 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("[Owner] " <img=2> "+ c.playerName + ": @dre@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } } }

item.title: Mod crown in yell help
item.dc:creator: @makersprivate123 makersprivate123
item.description:
@makersprivate123 wrote:

[quote=“drew56133, post:1, topic:472942”]How can i get it so when i yell it will look like this.

[Owner] Mod Turtle: hello

Its a 317/pi

This is my yell command:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.playerRights >= 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("[Owner] " + c.playerName + ": @dre@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } } }[/quote]
Look in the normal chat, and see if you can find anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod crown in yell help
item.dc:creator: @drew56133 drew56133
item.description:
@drew56133 wrote:

How can i get it so when i yell it will look like this.

[Owner] Mod Turtle: hello

Its a 317/pi

This is my yell command:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.playerRights >= 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("[Owner] " + c.playerName + ": @dre@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } } }

Read full topic
